Title: Signals
Writer: Simon Blackwell (teleplay), Simon Blackwell (story), Armando Iannucci (story), Armando Iannucci (creator)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: Selina attends a pig roast in North Carolina as part of the president's 'Listen to Rural America' initiative. Dan takes up Pilates to get face time.
